name: Specter (UniDen)
description: Specter This is a small 2D action/platformer game, the main mechanic of the game comes from the ability to dash and attach yourself from wall to wall, in order to escape from the prison-well.   ---------------------------------------------- Prologue story Welcome to the bottom on the well, Kid. I am Paragon. I have tried many times to escape, but have long since gave up. Maybe you can stand a chance. YOU MUST ESCAPE FROME THIS PRISON!  And here take this, you will need it it... THE SPECIAL HOOK!!! Gameplay In  the game you must fight with the enemies, olve different puzzles, upgrades the main character, and fight with the boses. The game have open location, that is, you can choose a path. Also on your way you can found secrets power, to help in the boss fight.
